hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
if [ -z "$job_id" ] ; then # get last number api_url="$JENKINS_URL""job/$job_name_extra/api/json" echo api_url=$api_url
all_job=`curl -X GET $api_url --user $jenkins_user:$admin_token` last_number=$(echo "${all_job}" | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['lastBuild']['number']") echo -e "\n\nlast number: $last_number\n\n"
job_id=$last_number fi
term_url="$JENKINS_URL""job/$job_name_extra/$job_id/term" check_url="$JENKINS_URL""job/$job_name_extra/$job_id/api/json"
pwd echo term_url: $term_url echo check_url: $check_url
# terminate time=0 while [ $time -lt 3 ]; do let "time++"
job_info=`curl -X GET $check_url --user $jenkins_user:$admin_token`
# check status first rst=$(echo "${job_info}" | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['result']") echo -e "\ntime: $time, result=$rst\n"
# None means ongoing if [ "$rst" != "None" ]; then devops_host_id=$(echo "${job_info}" | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['actions'][0]['parameters'][10]['value']") devops_compile_id=$(echo "${job_info}" | python -c "import json, sys; obj=json.load(sys.stdin); print obj['actions'][0]['parameters'][11]['value']") echo -e "\ntime: $time, devops_host_id=$devops_host_id, devops_compile_id=$devops_compile_id\n"
cd $script_path pwd
# update host status python3 update_db.py -t devops_server -k server_status -v 0 -w id -e $devops_host_id # update compile finish time build_finish_time=`date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` python3 update_db.py -t devops_compile \ -k compile_build_finish_time -v "$build_finish_time" \ -w id -e $devops_compile_id # update status python3 notify_status.py $devops_compile_id task_stopped exit 0 fi
curl -X POST $term_url --user $jenkins_user:$admin_token > /dev/null sleep 5s done
